name: Binding of the Old Gods
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
II — Search your library for a Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
III — Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn.

name: Elvish Warmaster
oracle_text:
Whenever one or more other Elves enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.
{5}{G}{G}: Elves you control get +2/+2 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

name: Alrund, God of the Cosmos // Hakka, Whispering Raven
type_line: Legendary Creatue — God // Legendary Creature — Bird

card_faces.name: Alrund, God of the Cosmos
card_faces.oracle_text:
Alrund gets +1/+1 fo each card in your hand and each foretold card you own in exile.
At the beginning of your end step, choose a card type, then reveal the top two cards of your library. Put all cards of the chosen type into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card_faces.name: Hakka, Whispering Raven
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Hakka, Whispering Raven deals combat damage to a player, return it to its owner's hand, then scry 2.
card_faces.flavor_text: Alrund's raven soars between realms; no secret is beyond his grasp.

name: Masked Vandal
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
When enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, exile target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

name: Old-Growth Troll
oracle_text:
Trample
When Old-Growth Troll dies, if it was a creature, return it to the battlefield. It's an Aura enchantment with enchant Forest you control and "Enchanted Forest has '{T}: Add {G}{G}' and '{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Create a 4/4 green Troll Warrior creature token with trample.'"

name: Koll, the Forgemaster
oracle_text:
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, if it was enchanted or equipped, return it to its owner's hand.
Creature tokens you control that are enchanted or equipped get +1/+1.

name: Koll, the Forgemaster
oracle_text:

flavor_text: Using trite from a fallen Cosmos monster, Koll forged a weapon to awe Halvar himself.

name: Inga Rune-Eyes
oracle_text:
When Inga Rune-Eyes enters the battlefield, scry 3.
When Inga Rune-Eyes dies, draw three cards if three or more creatures died this turn.

name: Valki, God of Lies // Tibalt, Cosmic Impostor
type_line: Legendary Creature — God // Legendary Planeswalker — Tibalt

card_faces.name: Valki, God of Lies
card_faces.oracle_text:
When Valki enters the battlefield, each opponent reveals their hand. For each opponent, exile a creature card they revealed this way until Valki leaves the battlefield.
{X}: Choose a creature card exiled with Valki with converted mana cost X. Valki becomes a copy of that card.

card_faces.name: Tibalt, Cosmic Impostor
card_faces.oracle_text:
As Tibalt enters the battlefield, you get an emblem with "You may play cards exiled with Tibalt, Cosmic Impostor, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells."
+2: Exile the top card of each player's library.
−3: Exile target artifact or creature.
−8: Exile all cards from all graveyards. Add {R}{R}{R}.
